title: What are some heart touching and soulful soft rock songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m surprised no one has mentioned “Wish You Were Here” by Pink Floyd! It’s soft, beautiful and utterly heart-breaking. Try Simon & Garfunkel. Most of their hits are wonderful - from “The Sound Of Silence” to “The Boxer” or even “Bridge Over Troubled Water”, “I Am A Rock” and “Mrs. Robinson”. My personal fave is “Homeward Bound” The Eagles had some nice ones, such as “Desperado”. Also the Everly Brothers’ “All I Have To Do Is Dream” Try folk-rock such as Bob Dylan - fave “Mr. Tambourine Man” and Neil Young (Old Man) as well as Joni Mitchell (Both Sides Now) Also November Rain by GNR, Try To Remember by The Brothers Four. And the softest, sweetest ever: Back In Black by AC DC as well as Anarchy In The U.K. by The Sex Pistols ;-)

I am not sure what you mean by heart touching but these songs are downright awesome. Stairway to heaven : Led zepplinAll about lovin' you : Jon Bon JoviLayla : Eric ClaptonAll along the watchtower : Jimi HendrixStill got the blues : Gary MooreRomeo and Juliet : Dire straitsBecause the night : Bruce SpringsteenLong walk home : Bruce.SpringsteenThe show must go on : QueenDon't cry : Guns n' RosesNovember Rain : Guns n' RosesSweet child o' mine : Guns n' RosesBrothers in arms : Dire straitsSomebody to love : QueenChasing Cars : Snow patrolFinal countdown : EuropeAmazing : AerosmithHollow years : Dream TheaterWither : Dream TheaterAnna Lee : Dream TheaterChosen : Dream TheaterI'll be there for you : Jon Bon JoviTo my experience, people expect songs like 'love story' by Taylor Swift. These songs belong to pop. Some songs are listed below : Iris : Goo Goo DollsHeroes : David BowieImpossible : James ArthurIt's probably me : Sting ft. Eric ClaptonShine on : James bluntYour body is a wonderland : John MayerAfterglow : INXSYou make me wanna : blueBest laid plans : James BluntCalling out your name : James Blunt
